verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH3947>, Take thee a great <WH1419> tablet <WH1549>, and write <WH3789> upon it with the pen <WH2747> of a man <WH582>, For Maher-shalal <WH4122>-hash-baz;
and I will take <WH5749> unto me faithful <WH539> witnesses <WH5707> to record <WH5749>, Uriah <WH223> the priest <WH3548>, and Zechariah <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Jeberechiah <WH3000>.

And I went <WH7126> unto the prophetess <WH5031>; and she conceived <WH2029>, and bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121>. Then said <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> unto me <WH7121>, Call his name <WH8034> Maher-shalal <WH4122>-hash-baz.

For before the child <WH5288> shall have knowledge <WH3045> to cry <WH7121>, My father <WH1>, and <WH517>, My mother, the riches <WH2428> of Damascus <WH1834> and the spoil <WH7998> of Samaria <WH8111> shall be carried away <WH5375> before <WH6440> the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto me yet again <WH3254>, saying <WH559>,

Forasmuch <WH3282> as this people <WH5971> have refused <WH3988> the waters <WH4325> of Shiloah <WH7975> that go <WH1980> softly <WH328>, and rejoice <WH4885> in Rezin <WH7526> and Remaliah <WH7425>'s son <WH1121>;

now therefore <WH136>, behold, the Lord bringeth up <WH5927> upon them the waters <WH4325> of the River <WH5104>, strong <WH6099> and many <WH7227>, even the king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> and all his glory <WH3519>: and it shall come up <WH5927> over all its channels <WH650>, and go over <WH1980> all its banks <WH1415>;

and it shall sweep <WH2498> onward into Judah <WH3063>; it shall overflow <WH7857> and pass through <WH5674>; it shall reach <WH5060> even to the neck <WH6677>; and the stretching out <WH4298> of its wings <WH3671> shall fill <WH4393> the breadth <WH7341> of thy land <WH776>, O Immanuel <WH6005>.

Make an uproar <WH7489>, O ye peoples <WH5971>, and be broken in pieces <WH2865>; and give ear <WH238>, all <WH3605> ye of far <WH4801> countries <WH776>: gird <WH247> yourselves <WH2865>, and be broken in pieces; gird <WH247> yourselves <WH2865>, and be broken in pieces.
Take <WH5779> counsel <WH6098> together <WH5779>, and it shall be brought to nought <WH6565>; speak <WH1696> the word <WH1697>, and it shall not stand <WH6965>: for God is with us <WH410>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> thus to me with a strong <WH2393> hand <WH3027>, and instructed <WH3256> me not to walk <WH3212> in the way <WH1870> of this people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>,

Say <WH559> ye not <WH7195>, A conspiracy, concerning all whereof this people <WH5971> shall say <WH559>, A conspiracy <WH7195>; neither fear <WH3372> ye their fear <WH4172>, nor be in dread thereof <WH4172>.
Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, him shall ye sanctify <WH6942>; and let him be your fear <WH4172>, and let him be your dread <WH6206>.

And he shall be for a sanctuary <WH4720>; but for a stone <WH68> of stumbling <WH5063> and for a rock <WH6697> of offence <WH4383> to both <WH8147> the houses <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, for a gin <WH6341> and for a snare <WH4170> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.
And many <WH7227> shall stumble <WH3782> thereon <WH5307>, and fall, and be broken <WH7665>, and be snared <WH3369>, and be taken <WH3920>.
Bind thou up <WH6887> the testimony <WH8584>, seal <WH2856> the law <WH8451> among my disciples <WH3928>.
And I will wait <WH2442> for Jehovah <WH3068>, that hideth <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, and I will look for him <WH6960>.

Behold <WH3206>, I and the children whom Jehovah <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> me are for signs <WH226> and for wonders <WH4159> in Israel <WH3478> from Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, who dwelleth <WH7931> in mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>.

And when they shall say <WH559> unto you <WH1875>, Seek unto them that have familiar spirits <WH178> and unto the wizards <WH3049>, that chirp <WH6850> and that mutter <WH1897>: should not a people <WH5971> seek <WH1875> unto their God <WH430>? on behalf of the living <WH2416> should they seek unto the dead <WH4191>?
To the law <WH8451> and to the testimony <WH8584>! if they speak <WH559> not according to this word <WH1697>, surely there is no morning for them <WH7837>.

And they shall pass <WH5674> through it <WH7185>, sore distressed and hungry <WH7457>; and it shall come to pass that <WH7456>, when they shall be hungry, they shall fret <WH7107> themselves <WH7043>, and curse by their king <WH4428> and by their God <WH430>, and turn <WH6437> their faces upward <WH4605>:

and they shall look <WH5027> unto the earth <WH776>, and behold <WH6869>, distress and darkness <WH2825>, the gloom <WH4588> of anguish <WH6695>; and into thick darkness <WH653> they shall be driven away <WH5080>.
